Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to tax credits for premiums paid for long-term care insurance
Summary: Provides that the tax credits for long-term health care insurance shall be up to $1,000 of the premiums paid for each policy of such insurance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the insurance law, in relation to the tax credits for premiums paid for long-term care insurance
